Package utilities

The utilities class provides a number of routines that required by the UCD 2001 roadway dispersion model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
convert_unit Overview
The convert_unit class stores conversion constants for manipulation of concentrations and mixing ratios.
DB_Access Overview
This class is used to gain access to a MS Access Dbase.
debugging Overview
The class debugging was created to simplify the debugging process of the UCD 2001 dispersion model.
default_naming Overview

This class provides default naming scheme for classes that require automated naming and bookeeping of named members.
format_matrix Overview

This class provides a quick static class convert arrays contents into strings for printing purposes.
met_processor Overview

This class provides a collection of subroutines helpful in manipulating meteorological data.
stack_info Overview
The stack_info class is a collection of static methods to allow users to quickly determine the call stack.
tic_toc Overview
This class provides a simple method to print out elapsed times for calculations and other events.
wind_vector Overview
This class provides a simple class to store information about a wind vector.
 

Package utilities Description

The utilities class provides a number of routines that required by the UCD 2001 roadway dispersion model. These routines provide the ability to format output, manipulate meteorological data, and facilitate code debugging.

Version:
1.0 (October 2001)
Author:
Tony Held
